name: Ramnee Systems
tag_list: restaurants-in-hyderabad, restaurant-menu, restaurant-delivery, catering, home-delivery, order-food-online, table-reservation, place-order-for-home-delivery, pickup, take-away, party-orders, pizza, meals-delivery, reviews, lunch, dinner, cuisine, chinese-
overview:
Ramnee.com is an online food ordering website serving food delicacies for our customers in all locations in Hyderabad. Currently 500+ restaurants are registered with us and it provides an easy access to customers to browse their menus and order food online anytime (24x7). Customer pays only for the food and also gets our online services for free. Ramnee.com is the first and only online portal to combine a network for foodies with search and discovery of all the restaurants in Hyderabad.

Restaurants that partner with Ramnee.com get access to a number of online customers who get to read/know more about your restaurant through our site. Each restaurant also has its own dedicated webpage, where customers may directly view the menu and order the food at the click of a mouse.

Recently, we launched RESTAURANT DISCOUNT CARD, using which customers can get upto 20% discount on their restaurant bills. Show our CARD to restaurant before the bill is generated, your bill will get the discount. Right now, around 300+ restaurants are registered in this program and many more are signing up. Customer can save lots of money with this card. Discount card costs Rs. 300.
